page.title: 12SOCIAL CONCERNS.
page.content: There is a very high concentration of {mentally ill}and{mentally handicapped people in Moseley.Both groups need support and a caring home.Hotels with profit motives are unsuitable housing.Closure of mental homes means heavystress on communities.Care from skilled staff is needed.The church offers{rehabilitation}and amusement to both groups.Concern for the numbers of these people in the parish is real.It is felt that saturation is bad,dispersal,council provision and help for families are vital. { Litter}is a serious problem.Some say that roadsweepers should be employed, although there are disagreements as to how often they should come.Most people were aware of the Â£100 fine for dropping litter and thought it should be enforced, and that shop owners should care for their own areas.
